TITLE: Cloning OpenLiteSpeed Docker Environment Repository
DESCRIPTION: This command clones the OpenLiteSpeed Docker environment repository to the local machine. It's the first step in setting up the WordPress container.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
git clone https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env.git
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Docker Containers
DESCRIPTION: These commands start the Docker containers defined in the docker-compose.yml file. The second command runs the containers in daemon mode.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up -d
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Starting Demo WordPress Site
DESCRIPTION: This command initializes a demo WordPress site with the configured domain (default is http://localhost).
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/demosite.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing WordPress
DESCRIPTION: This command installs WordPress for a specific domain. It should be run after creating the database using the database.sh script.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./bin/appinstall.sh [-A, --app] wordpress [-D, --domain] example.com
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Creating MySQL Database
DESCRIPTION: These commands create a MySQL database for a domain. The first command auto-generates credentials, while the second allows specifying custom credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/database.sh [-D, --domain] example.com
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/database.sh [-D, --domain] example.com [-U, --user] USER_NAME [-P, --password] MY_PASS [-DB, --database] DATABASE_NAME
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting WebAdmin Password
DESCRIPTION: This command sets a custom password for the WebAdmin interface. It's recommended to set a personal password immediately after setup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/webadmin.sh my_password
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Let's Encrypt Certificate
DESCRIPTION: This command applies a Let's Encrypt SSL certificate for a specified domain. It automatically handles both www and non-www versions of the domain.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./bin/acme.sh [-D, --domain] example.com
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing ACME
DESCRIPTION: This command installs ACME for SSL certificate management. It should be run only once during the initial setup.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
./bin/acme.sh [-I, --install] [-E, --email] EMAIL_ADDR
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing Domains and Virtual Hosts
DESCRIPTION: These commands add or delete domains and their corresponding virtual hosts in the OpenLiteSpeed server configuration.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/domain.sh [-A, --add] example.com
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/domain.sh [-D, --del] example.com
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Customizing OpenLiteSpeed Docker Image
DESCRIPTION: This Dockerfile example shows how to extend the base OpenLiteSpeed image to include additional packages like lsphp83-pspell.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: dockerfile
CODE:
```
FROM litespeedtech/openlitespeed:latest
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install lsphp83-pspell -y
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building and Starting Custom Docker Image
DESCRIPTION: This command builds and starts the custom Docker image with additional packages added through the Dockerfile.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose up --build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Updating OpenLiteSpeed Web Server
DESCRIPTION: This command upgrades the OpenLiteSpeed web server to the latest stable version.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/webadmin.sh [-U, --upgrade]
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Managing OWASP ModSecurity
DESCRIPTION: These commands enable or disable the OWASP ModSecurity module on the OpenLiteSpeed web server.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/webadmin.sh [-M, --mod-secure] enable
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bash bin/webadmin.sh [-M, --mod-secure] disable
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Stopping and Removing Docker Containers
DESCRIPTION: These commands stop the running containers and remove all containers defined in the docker-compose.yml file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/litespeedtech/ols-docker-env/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose stop
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker compose down
```
